Original:
木柵人週末想喝一杯,
去市區要回來實在太麻煩,
因此逛到這家在附近的小酒館.

主打在地差異化
貓空茶/梅酒/奶酒/威士忌

招牌是 "鐵觀音梅酒"
(茶是老闆去貓空與茶農合作自己煮,
據說很搞剛)

1. 鐵觀音梅酒
入口當下 "清爽, 和諧"
初始梅酒風味 + 末段茶香

2. 鐵觀音威士忌梅酒
入口當下混合了 "泥煤/梅子/些微的茶香"
"非常" 有層次, 喜歡威士忌的推薦試試

一杯 250~300

---

店裡的氣氛很放鬆, 老闆很好聊/好客.

原本想說一個人怕無聊
帶本書以備不時之需
結果根本沒看幾頁 🤣

整體推薦
EN:
Muzha people want to have a drink on weekends,
It's too much trouble to come back to the city,
So visit this small tavern nearby.

Mainly differentiated
Cat Empty Tea/Plum Wine/Milk Wine/Whiskey

The signboard is "Tieguanyinmei wine"
(Tea is the boss who goes to Cat Emperor to cook with tea farmers.
It is said that it is very just))

1. Tieguanyin plum wine
The entrance is "refreshing, harmonious"
Initial plum wine flavor + last tea fragrance

2. Tieguanyin whiskey plum wine
The entrance is mixed with "mud/plum/slight tea fragrance"
"Very" level, I like the recommendation of whiskey

One cup 20 ~ 300

---

The atmosphere in the store is very relaxed, the boss is very good at chatting/hospitable.

Originally I wanted to say that a person is afraid of boring
Bring this book to prepare from time to time
As a result, I didn't read a few pages at all 看

Overall recommendation

Original:
無菜單酒吧，以威士忌純飲、啤酒、梅酒，以及市面上少見的威士忌茶酒及梅酒茶酒為主。茶酒系列一杯300元。

第一次來最推薦喝兩杯：鐵觀音梅酒、鐵觀音威士忌。
前者的鐵觀音茶香非常鮮明，沒有被味道濃厚的梅酒蓋掉，兩者搭配也很清新突出。
後者則是以泥煤味的威士忌為基底，茶香滿巧妙的綜合了一般人接受度較低的泥煤味，相較前者來說，茶香沒那麼明顯，但整體的味道更富層次變化。

老闆十分親切客氣，可以大方跟老闆聊酒，不用怕不懂就被批判🤣 而且也很常招待些點心或shot～
EN:
There are no menu, with whiskey pure drinks, beer, plum wine, and the rare whiskey tea and plum tea wine on the market.The tea wine series is 300 yuan.

For the first time, I recommend drinking two cups: Tieguanyin plum wine, Tieguanyin whiskey.
The former Tieguanyin Tea has a very distinctive fragrance. It is not covered by the strong plum wine, and the combination of the two is also very fresh and prominent.
The latter is based on the whiskey of the mud flavor. The tea fragrance cleverly integrates the mud flavor with a lower acceptance of the average person. Compared with the former, the tea aroma is not so obvious, but the overall taste is richer in layered changes. Essence

The boss is very kind and polite, you can talk to the boss generously, you don't have to be criticized if you don't understand it, and you often entertain some snacks or Shot ~

Original: 我和一個朋友在 10/10 長週末去了這個地方，當時附近大多數酒吧都關門了。地方有PS5可以玩，各種梅花酒和威士忌。我只嘗試過啤酒，但我一定會回來喝一些更烈的烈酒。我真正喜歡這個地方的是客戶服務，調酒師（向 Tee 致敬）出色地向我們介紹了他們的選擇。我和我的朋友也很享受與 Tee 的交談。我一定會回來的。
EN: A friend and I went to this place on the 10/10 weekend. At that time, most of the bar nearby was closed.There are PS5s to play, various plum wines and whiskey.I have only tried beer, but I will definitely come back to drink some more strong spirits.I really like this place for customer service. The bartender (tribute to TEE) introduced us to their choices.My friends and I also enjoy talking to Tee.I will definitely come back.
